original_text:
therefore they shall eat the fruit of their way,
    and have their fill of their own devices.
korean_text: 그러므로 자기 행위의 열매를 먹으며 자기 꾀에 배부르리라

sentences.original_text: therefore they shall eat the fruit of their way
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 그들의 길의 열매를 먹게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and have their fill of their own devices
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 자신의 꾀를 마음껏 누릴 것입니다
